An easy-to-use guide to stockpiling and survival. 

In todayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s world, anything can happenÃ¢â‚¬â€medical emergencies, power outages, natural disasters. In less time than it takes to sign off on an insurance form, the world as we know it can be brought to a standstill. There can be no question: ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best to be prepared. 

The Emergency Pantry Handbook by cooking expert and readiness enthusiast Kate Rowinski offers tips, techniques, and advice on how to keep your family safe, well-fed, and fully supplied in the event of any crisis. With simple instructions, Rowinski demonstrates how to create an emergency strategy; how to protect your house, documents, and keepsakes; and how to prepare for specific disasters. Offering a unique twist on preparation handbooks, Rowinski focuses on food storage and cookingÃ¢â‚¬â€put simply, how to plan nutritional emergency meals and avoid Ã¢â‚¬Å“making dueÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ on canned meats and chocolate bars. The Emergency Pantry Handbook details: 

Ã‚Â· Storage techniques

Whether a disaster lasts for twenty-four hours or twenty-four weeks, The Emergency Pantry Handbook is the ultimate guide to keeping your family eating healthily and maintaining proper nutrition, even in the worst of circumstances.
